member.name: HTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER
member.summary: TheHTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER structure contains the name and value for a header in an HTTP request or response whose name does not appear in the enumeration.

member.name: HTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER.NameLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data pointed to by the pName member not counting a terminating null.

member.name: HTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER.RawValueLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data pointed to by the pRawValue member, in bytes.

member.name: HTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER.pName
member.summary: A pointer to a string of octets that specifies the header name. Use NameLength to determine the end of the string, rather than relying on a terminating null.

member.name: HTTP_UNKNOWN_HEADER.pRawValue
member.summary: A pointer to a string of octets that specifies the values for this header. Use RawValueLength to determine the end of the string, rather than relying on a terminating null.
